Technical Risk.description: Uncertainty whether the technology will perform, scale, or maintain quality in real-world conditions.
mitigation: Plan structured pilots and verification tests.
Add QA gates and reliability checks to development.

Market Adoption Risk.description: Customers might not adopt quickly due to awareness, fit, or behaviour change barriers.
indicators: Value proposition not yet crystal clear
mitigation: Run user trials and collect testimonials.

Funding / Liquidity Risk.description: Cash-flow shortages or insufficient funding runway to scale.
indicators: High CAPEX or long payback period
mitigation: Diversify funding sources (equity, grants, revenue finance).
Adopt lean operations and early revenue.

IP / Legal Risk.description: Insufficient IP protection, unclear ownership, or regulatory exposure.
indicators: No filings yet or pending disputes
mitigation: File provisional or design protection early.

Partnership Risk.description: Over-reliance on or misalignment with key partners and stakeholders.
mitigation: Formalise MoUs with SLAs and exit clauses.

Operational Risk.description: Internal processes, supply chains, or resources cannot meet demand reliably.

ESG / Sustainability Risk.description: Environmental, social, or governance issues harm reputation, compliance, or access to capital.
mitigation: Align with SDGs and local policy.
